info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 4:22PM MDT until May 23 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CURRY COUNTY... At 422 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Texico, or 10 miles northeast of Clovis, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Farwell, Texico, Cannon Air Force Base, Portair and Pleasant Hill. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 380 and 397. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rains may flood intersections, ditches and underpasses. Do not attempt to drive through areas where water covers the roadway.
